question:
1.    Complete the dialog by correcting the words in the brackets.
Diyan : (1/ want/go/ Daly city)
(the bus/ go / Daly city)?
Hayu : No, it doesn't.
Diyan : Where does it go?
Hayu : (it/go/ downtown).
Diyan: How do I get to Daly City?
Hayu
(cross / the street) and (wait / the next Number 14).
Source: http://squirrelspace.blogspot.co.id
2.
a.
Choose the correct time expression used with the present continuous tense.
What are you doing (tomorrow / yesterday) afternoon?
b. (Currently / Current) we're working on the Anderson account.
What are you doing (this/next) afternoon?
d. Thomas is presenting at the meeting (on / in) April.
Change the word in the brackets into past tense form.
C.
3.
1 (wake) up around 8:30 a.m. in the morning yesterday. When I (look) at the
clock 1 (say), "Oh, I'm getting late for the Yoga class and my teacher is going to
punish me for this." It (be not) the first time for me to be late for the class.

TOLONG DIBANTU YA KAK NO 1.2.3​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Dyan : I want to go to Daly city.

Does the bus go to Daly city?

Hayu : No, It doesn't.

Dyan : Where does it go?

Hayu : It goes downtown.

Dyan : How do i get to Daly city?

Hayu : Go cross the street and wait the next bus number 14.

2. a. Tomorrow

b. Currently

c. This

d. In

3. woke,looked,said,was not,

Penjelasan:

hope you find this helpful^•^

related_questions.question: When was he chosen as minister of education? *

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

When was he chosen as minister of education?

He was chosen as the minister of education in 2019.

Penjelasan:

Kalimat menggunakan bentuk Passive dari Simple Past Tense:

(+) Subject + Tobe (was/were) + Verb-3

Semoga membantu ya.

tenderly

related_questions.question:
11.Nanda and her brother ... at five o'clock every morning.    a. woke up
b. wake up
c. waking up
12. The students ... study online in 2019.
a. Do not
b. did not
c. were not
13. Junercho ... the film until 10 pm every night
a. Watches
b. watch
C. watched
14. Dewa wanted to be a teacher when he ... a child.
b. do
c. am
15. Does your father ... to work early in the morning?
a. go
b. went
C. gone
16.Tiger and lion ... the heaviest land animal.
a. is not
b. are not
C. do not
a. was​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

11. B. Wake up.

12. A. Do not.

13. A. Watches.

14. Was.

15. A. Go.

16. B. Are not.

Penjelasan:

Nomor 11-16 menggunakan kalimat Simple Present Tense, kecuali nomor 14 menggunakan kalimat Simple Past Tense.

Semoga membantu ^_^

related_questions.question:
Read the following text to answer the q.    Pink Beach
Last holiday I went to Komodo island. There is a gorgeous beach which has pink colored-sand. The
beach is called Pink Beach or Pantai Merah Muda,
Il's a huge beach with a calm wave. When I looked it closely, I could see that it actually an ordinary
white beach sand. But there are a lot of crushed corals and minerals that make it looks pink. Pink beach is a
special beach, There's no one beach in this world has a beautiful pink sand like this.
1. What is the text about?
2. Where is it located ?
3. Why the sand has pink color?
4. Why does the writer think that Pink Beach is a special one?
5.
" ....... It actually an ordinary white beach sand."
What is the Indonesian translation of the underlined word ?​

answers.answer:
1. Pink beach

2. Komodo Island

3. Because a lot of crushed corals and minerals make the sand looks pink

4. because there's no one beach in this world has a beautiful pink sand like that

5. mana kata bergaris bawah nya?

semoga bermanfaat.

1.pink beach

2.in comodo island

3.Because that is a gorgeous beach

4.Because that's beach verry langkah

5.pantai merah.

Penjelasan:

SEMOGA TIDAK MEMBANTU
